Name: Asphalt Shingle
Type: manmade
Class: Roofing Material
Subclass: Roofing Shingle
Particle Size: Solid
Sample No.: 0490UUUASP
Owner: National Photographic Interpretation Center
Wavelength Range: All
Origin: Spectra obtained from the Noncoventional Exploitation FactorsData System of the National Photographic Interpretation Center.
Collection Date: N/A
Description:  White, granule-covered asphalt roofing shingle. Sample was tar paper, with a white sand coating over construction asphalt. Original ASTER Spectral Library name was jhu.becknic.manmade.roofing.shingle.solid.0490uuu.spectrum.txt
Measurement: Directional (10 Degree) Hemispherical Reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units: Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:  0.3000
Last X Value: 15.0000
Number of X Values: 561
Additional Information: none
